The maven2 is a great tool to manage and build java projects. Here we have extended to create easy and ready to use application templates called archetypes.

= Using Archetypes =

== Creating typical Java library/CLI application ==

Maven2 archetype already providing a default quicstart or simplejavaapp archetype. But this template is soo simple that you will hit error as soon as you start coding! Like it default to use JDK1.4 or below, so you can' use enchanced for loop and generics!

Here is how you create a our version of javaapp
{{{maven-support/bin/create-javaapp.sh com.mycompany.myproject myproject}}}
